name: P2P.org [all AVS]
description: Forget FOMO with P2P.org. Delegate and be sure we onboard all possible AVS and share any airdrops with delegators.  Each AVS will be thoroughly evaluated before slashing is enabled, projected for Q3. P2P.org is a global leader with $7.5 billion and over 90,000 delegators across 40+ networks.
